page.title: 20COMMUNICATION,CRW.AREA,TENBY
page.content: The result of the survey conducted by the school show the following facts:_ { Of 126 people questioned 114 (90.5%) {said they had T.V.'s at home,85 (65%) {had a radio and 41 people (33%) had {Hifi sets. We also tried to find out if people had news from papers by asking in school.{72%}said they{had daily news_ {papers. In the 12Km area block there are{3 {telephone boxes and 2 pay phones in {public houses. 92 (76%)}of the people questioned{have telephones at home. There is{1 letter delivery a day. {Mail is collected twice a day}from most collection boxes.This is because it is a rural area. There is a{sub {post office in Milton.
